question: Which of the following is not true about Raidas ?
option1: He was from the dalit community
option3: He was the Bhakti saint of North India
explanation: Saint Raidas ji was a North Indian Guru mystic of the bhakti movement from Ramanandi Sampradaya and one of the disciples of Ramananda during 15th century. He belonged to the Kutbandhla Chamar caste. His devotional songs were included in the Sikh holy book, Guru Granth Sahib.
